item.description:
We will have fun learning about the many uses of a pendulum.  You will need to bring your own, but do know you can simply tie a washer on the end of a string and that will be fine!   No need for anything fancy! 

Be sure to bring enough food for at least four people and be prepared for good conversation, great food and a terrific time with like minded people! 

See  you there!

In March, our meetup will be a past life regression!  We are very excited about that.
item.how_to_find_us: come to the upper porch and walk in!
item.name: Learn about the Pendulum!
